phases.name: Foundation
phases.description: Set up monorepo infrastructure, implement core runtime, build basic CLI

steps.title: Initialize monorepo with Turborepo
steps.description: Set up Turborepo workspace with packages structure, configure build pipeline, add shared configs

steps.title: Configure shared TypeScript config
steps.description: Create base tsconfig.json with strict mode, path aliases, and shared compiler options

steps.title: Set up ESLint and Prettier
steps.description: Configure code quality tools with shared configs, TypeScript rules, and auto-formatting
commands: pnpm add -D eslint prettier eslint-config-prettier eslint-plugin-typescript

steps.title: Configure Husky for Git hooks
steps.description: Set up pre-commit hooks for linting and formatting

steps.title: Set up GitHub Actions CI/CD
steps.description: Create CI pipeline for lint, typecheck, build, and test on pull requests

steps.title: Create shared package for types
steps.description: Set up @agentik-os/shared package with common TypeScript types and interfaces

steps.title: Create runtime package scaffold
steps.description: Initialize @agentik-os/runtime package with directory structure

steps.title: Implement Message Pipeline - Stage 1: Normalize
steps.description: Create message normalization logic to convert channel-specific formats to unified Message type

steps.title: Implement Message Pipeline - Stage 2: Route
steps.description: Create routing logic to determine target agent(s) based on @mentions, channel, or default

steps.title: Implement Message Pipeline - Stage 3: Load Memory
steps.description: Create memory loading logic for short-term and session tiers

steps.title: Implement Model Router - Complexity Scoring
steps.description: Create complexity scoring algorithm (0-100) based on message length, keywords, code blocks

steps.title: Implement Model Router - Model Selection
steps.description: Create model selection logic based on complexity, budget, and preferences

steps.title: Implement Model Router - Anthropic Provider
steps.description: Create Anthropic API client for Claude models (Opus, Sonnet, Haiku)

steps.title: Implement Model Router - OpenAI Provider
steps.description: Create OpenAI API client for GPT models (o1, GPT-4o, GPT-4o Mini)

steps.title: Implement Message Pipeline - Stage 4: Model Select
steps.description: Integrate model router into pipeline to select optimal model for each message

steps.title: Implement Message Pipeline - Stage 5: Tool Resolution
steps.description: Create tool resolution logic to determine available tools for execution (stub for now)

steps.title: Implement Message Pipeline - Stage 6: Execute
steps.description: Create execution logic to call LLM API and handle tool calls

steps.title: Implement Message Pipeline - Stage 7: Save Memory
steps.description: Create memory saving logic to persist conversation to backend

steps.title: Implement Message Pipeline - Stage 8: Track Cost
steps.description: Create cost tracking logic to calculate and save cost events

steps.title: Implement Message Pipeline - Stage 9: Send Response
steps.description: Create response sending logic to deliver message via channel adapter

steps.title: Implement Pipeline Orchestrator
steps.description: Create main pipeline orchestrator that executes all 9 stages in sequence

steps.title: Set Up Convex Schema
steps.description: Initialize Convex and define schema for conversations, agents, memories, cost events, skills, and cron jobs with vector indexes

steps.title: Implement Convex Conversations
steps.description: Create queries and mutations for saving and retrieving conversations with real-time subscriptions and pagination

steps.title: Implement Convex Agents
steps.description: Create queries and mutations for agent CRUD operations with real-time updates

steps.title: Implement Convex Memory with Vector Search
steps.description: Create vector-indexed memory storage for agent long-term memory with similarity search and importance ranking

steps.title: Implement Convex Cost Tracking
steps.description: Create real-time cost event logging with aggregation queries for dashboard Cost X-Ray

steps.title: Implement CLI Channel Adapter
steps.description: Create CLI channel adapter for interactive terminal chat

steps.title: Implement API Channel Adapter
steps.description: Create REST API adapter for HTTP-based integrations
commands: pnpm add express cors helmet express-rate-limit

steps.title: Create CLI package scaffold
steps.description: Initialize @agentik-os/cli package with commander setup
commands: pnpm add commander inquirer chalk ora

steps.title: Implement CLI - agentik-os init
steps.description: Create init command to initialize configuration file

steps.title: Implement CLI - agentik-os agent create
steps.description: Create agent create command with interactive wizard

steps.title: Implement CLI - agentik-os agent list
steps.description: Create agent list command to display all agents

steps.title: Implement CLI - agentik-os chat
steps.description: Create interactive chat command with readline interface

steps.title: Implement CLI - agentik-os logs
steps.description: Create logs command to view conversation history

steps.title: Set up Vitest for unit testing
steps.description: Configure Vitest across all packages with coverage reporting

steps.title: Write integration tests for message pipeline
steps.description: Create end-to-end tests for complete message flow

steps.title: Write documentation - Getting Started
steps.description: Create getting started guide with installation and first agent

steps.title: Write documentation - Architecture
steps.description: Document system architecture with diagrams

steps.title: Create README.md
steps.description: Write comprehensive README with features, installation, quick start

steps.title: Phase 0 End-to-End Test
steps.description: Verify complete flow: CLI agent creation, conversation, response, memory saved

phases.name: Core Features
phases.description: Launch dashboard, implement Cost X-Ray, add Telegram/Discord channels, build skill execution engine

steps.title: Create dashboard package with Next.js 16
steps.description: Initialize @agentik-os/dashboard with Next.js App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind

steps.title: Install shadcn/ui in dashboard
steps.description: Set up shadcn/ui components library with theme configuration
commands: cd packages/dashboard && pnpm dlx shadcn-ui@latest init
pnpm dlx shadcn-ui@latest add button card table badge dialog

steps.title: Create dashboard API routes
steps.description: Set up Next.js API routes to communicate with runtime

steps.title: Implement Dashboard - Sidebar Navigation
steps.description: Create responsive sidebar with navigation links and logo

steps.title: Implement Dashboard - Overview Page
steps.description: Create overview page with agent status, cost summary, recent activity

steps.title: Implement Dashboard - Agents List Page
steps.description: Create agents list page with table, filters, create button

steps.title: Implement Dashboard - Agent Create Wizard
steps.description: Create multi-step agent creation form with validation

steps.title: Implement Dashboard - Agent Detail Page
steps.description: Create agent detail page with conversation history, edit, delete

steps.title: Implement Event-Sourced Cost Events
steps.description: Create immutable cost event log with append-only writes

steps.title: Implement Real-Time Cost Calculation
steps.description: Create cost calculator that computes cost on every message

steps.title: Implement Cost Aggregation Queries
steps.description: Create SQL queries for daily/weekly/monthly cost summaries

steps.title: Implement Dashboard - Cost X-Ray Page
steps.description: Create cost tracking page with charts, breakdowns, export

steps.title: Implement Budget Alerts
steps.description: Create budget limit checks and email/Telegram notifications

steps.title: Implement Cost Export (CSV/PDF)
steps.description: Create cost report export in CSV and PDF formats

steps.title: Implement WebSocket for Real-Time Updates
steps.description: Create WebSocket server for pushing real-time updates to dashboard

steps.title: Implement Telegram Bot Integration
steps.description: Create Telegram bot channel adapter with telegram-bot-api

steps.title: Implement Discord Bot Integration
steps.description: Create Discord bot channel adapter with discord.js

steps.title: Implement Webhook Channel Adapter
steps.description: Create generic webhook adapter for custom integrations

steps.title: Implement MCP Protocol Integration
steps.description: Add MCP (Model Context Protocol) support for tool discovery and execution

steps.title: Implement WASM Sandbox with Extism
steps.description: Create WASM-based skill sandbox using Extism

steps.title: Implement Permission System for Skills
steps.description: Create permission declarations and runtime checks for skills

steps.title: Create Built-in Skill: Web Search
steps.description: Build web search skill using Brave Search API or Serper

steps.title: Create Built-in Skill: File Operations
steps.description: Build file read/write/list skill with sandboxed access

steps.title: Create Built-in Skill: Calendar
steps.description: Build calendar skill with Google Calendar integration

steps.title: Implement Skill Installation Flow
steps.description: Create CLI and dashboard flows for installing skills

steps.title: Write Documentation - Skills Development
steps.description: Create comprehensive guide for skill development

steps.title: Implement Dashboard Dark Mode
steps.description: Add dark mode theme with toggle and persistence

steps.title: Implement Dashboard Mobile Responsiveness
steps.description: Optimize dashboard for mobile screens with responsive design

steps.title: Write Integration Tests for Dashboard
steps.description: Create Playwright tests for dashboard pages and flows

steps.title: Phase 1 End-to-End Test
steps.description: Verify dashboard works, cost tracking accurate, Telegram bot responds

phases.name: Advanced Features
phases.description: Launch Agent Marketplace, implement OS Modes, add multi-AI consensus, build natural language automation builder

steps.title: Design Marketplace Database Schema
steps.description: Create schema for agents, skills, ratings, reviews, purchases

steps.title: Implement Marketplace - Browse Page
steps.description: Create marketplace browse page with search, filters, categories

steps.title: Implement Marketplace - Agent Detail Page
steps.description: Create agent detail page with description, screenshots, reviews, install button

steps.title: Implement Live Preview Sandbox
steps.description: Create isolated sandbox environment for testing agents before installation

steps.title: Integrate Stripe for Payments
steps.description: Set up Stripe integration for marketplace purchases

steps.title: Implement Revenue Split Logic
steps.description: Create 70/30 revenue split calculation and payout tracking

steps.title: Implement Developer Dashboard - Analytics
steps.description: Create analytics dashboard for marketplace creators

steps.title: Implement CLI - agentik-os publish
steps.description: Create CLI command to publish agents/skills to marketplace

steps.title: Implement Security Scanning - Semgrep
steps.description: Integrate Semgrep for static code analysis on skill uploads

steps.title: Implement Security Scanning - Bandit
steps.description: Integrate Bandit for Python security scanning

steps.title: Implement Manual Review Workflow
steps.description: Create admin interface for manual review and certification

steps.title: Create OS Modes Database Schema
steps.description: Create schema for modes, mode agents, mode tools, mode activations

steps.title: Implement Mode Definitions - Human OS
steps.description: Create Human OS mode with health agents and tools

steps.title: Implement Mode Definitions - Business OS
steps.description: Create Business OS mode with financial agents and tools

steps.title: Implement Mode Definitions - Dev OS
steps.description: Create Dev OS mode with development agents and tools

steps.title: Implement Remaining Official Modes
steps.description: Create Marketing, Sales, Design, Art, Ask, Finance, Learning OS modes

steps.title: Implement Mode Activation Wizard
steps.description: Create multi-step wizard to activate and configure modes

steps.title: Implement Mode Stacking
steps.description: Allow multiple modes to run simultaneously with shared memory

steps.title: Implement Mode Dashboard Widgets
steps.description: Create mode-specific dashboard widgets (health metrics, revenue, etc.)

steps.title: Implement Multi-AI Consensus - Deliberation Engine
steps.description: Create deliberation protocol for parallel queries to multiple models

steps.title: Implement Multi-AI Consensus - Synthesis Agent
steps.description: Create meta-agent that synthesizes responses from multiple models

steps.title: Implement Multi-AI Consensus - Debate Protocol
steps.description: Create structured debate rounds where models challenge each other

steps.title: Implement Consensus Dashboard UI
steps.description: Create UI to trigger consensus, view debate, see recommendations

steps.title: Implement Natural Language Automation Parser
steps.description: Create LLM-based parser to convert plain English to automation config

steps.title: Implement Automation Execution Engine
steps.description: Create cron-based automation scheduler and executor

steps.title: Implement Visual Automation Builder
steps.description: Create drag-and-drop flow builder UI for automations

steps.description: Create execution history viewer with logs and error tracking

steps.title: Implement Google Gemini Provider
steps.description: Add Google Gemini models to model router

steps.title: Implement Ollama Provider
steps.description: Add Ollama local models to model router

steps.description: Verify marketplace works, modes activate, consensus runs, automations execute

steps.description: Implement QA phase with MANIAC integration, test validation, and iteration loop

steps.title: Deployment & Handoff
steps.description: Implement deployment to Vercel/Netlify and handoff package generation (docs, cost breakdown, next steps)

steps.title: Project Creator Dashboard UI
steps.description: Create dashboard interface for Project Creator with live workflow progress, team monitoring, and approval gates

steps.title: Project Creator CLI Integration
steps.description: Expose Project Creator through CLI (agentik create) with interactive mode

steps.title: Project Templates Library
steps.description: Create library of project templates (SaaS, E-commerce, Blog, API, Chrome Extension) for faster scaffolding

steps.title: Project Creator Cost Tracking
steps.description: Integrate Project Creator costs with Cost X-Ray for detailed per-phase breakdown

steps.title: Project Creator E2E Tests
steps.description: Comprehensive E2E tests for Project Creator workflow covering all phases and edge cases

milestones.name: Phase 0 Complete: Foundation Ready
milestones.description: Monorepo set up, runtime working, basic CLI functional

milestones.name: Phase 1 Complete: Core Features Launched
milestones.description: Dashboard live, Cost X-Ray working, Telegram bot responding

milestones.name: Phase 2 Complete: Advanced Features Released
milestones.description: Marketplace launched with 100+ agents, modes activated, consensus running

milestones.name: $1M ARR from Cloud Plans
milestones.description: Reach $1M annual recurring revenue from cloud subscriptions

risks.risk: OpenClaw releases major update before launch
risks.mitigation: Emphasize unique features (multi-model, dashboard, security) that OpenClaw lacks
Cost X-Ray provides transparency, Ollama support for local models
Multi-layer security (WASM, gVisor, Kata), bug bounty program
Strong developer experience, certification program, revenue sharing
Start with manual review, automate gradually, Cloudflare CDN

notes: Updated: Convex-only backend. Removed SQLite/Supabase adapters, added Convex implementation (54h). Total: 261 steps, 4170h. Updated: 2026-02-13
